text: firaun baalaah kya tumane usaka vishvaas kar liya, isase poorv ki main tumhen aagya doon? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara bada (guroo) hai, jisane tumhen jaadoo sikhaaya hai. to main avashy katava doonga tumhaare haathon tatha paavon ko, vipareet disha[1] se aur tumhen soolee de doonga khajoor ke tanon par tatha tumhen avashy gyaan ho jaayega ki hamamen se kisakee yaatana adhik kadee tatha sthaayee hai
